devices.title: You don't have any connected devices
devices.text: By installing the various clients, you will be able to access your files on all your screens et simultaneously. Cozy will always be at hand reach, even if you are always on the road!

instance.server_error: Something went wrong with the server. Please, reload the page.

password.title: Password
password.server_error: Something went wrong. Your password has not been saved.
password.password_too_weak: Your password is too weak. You should add an uppercase, a number, a special character or a longer password.
password.reload: Your password has been changed. The page is going to reload so the change can take effect.

infos.server_error: Something went wrong. Your informations has not been saved.

email.title: E-mail
email.label: Cozy needs your e-mail to send you notifications and allow you to recover your password
email.error: The e-mail address does not feel right. Are you sure you wrote it correctly (e.g. john@wayne.com)?

twofa.label:
Because two steps are better than one, improve your Cozy security with an additionnal step.
[Check out our assistance website ‚Üí](%{link})

modal.protect: Protect your Cozy with two steps authentication
modal.change:
**What's changing?** Everytime you'll connect to your Cozy, you'll need your password and a validation code.
[Check out our assistance website ‚Üí](%{link})
modal.secu_description: Password, that's good, but if it isn't "complicated", a thief can easily guess it. Receive a validation code by mail assure the control of your Cozy.
modal.protect_title: Improve the protection of your data
modal.protect_description: Even if a thief get your password, you stay the only captain able to connect to your Cozy
modal.desactivate_title: Are you sure to disable this option?
modal.desactivate_description: On clicking on "Desactivate" button, your password will be the only key to access your Cozy. You will delete a security level.
modal.confirmation_description:
Your Cozy send a 6 digits validation code to %{email}.
Entre the code behind to activate authentication.
modal.nocode: You do not receive any code?
modal.validation_description: Your Cozy is now secured with 2 steps.
modal.email: You should provide a valid email address

public_name.title: Username
public_name.label: Your username will be displayed when you share files with Cozy users.

tracking.title: Help us to improve our product
tracking.label: Authorize Cozy Cloud to get anonymously your usage data to improve our product.

locale.title: Language
locale.label: This will be the language used in your Cozy.
locale.contrib: Interested in helping translate Cozy? [Check out how you can **give us a hand** on that](%{link}).

revokeDevice.title: Revoke this device
revokeDevice.subText: It will immediately stop syncing with this device.
revokeDevice.error: Unable to revoke the device, try to reload the page.

soon.title: Coming soon
soon.description: This feature is not available yet. For more information, please contact us at contact@cozycloud.cc

support.title: Hi! Can we help you?
support.emailDetail: Your message will be sent from your email address saved in your Cozy settings.

message.title: Your request
message.placeholder: Tell us anything (ask for help, share a feedback or just say hello). We'll be happy to talk to you.

response_email.subject: Your request has been correctly received
response_email.body:
Hello,

We correctly received your support request:
%{message}

We are doing our best to respond you as soon as possible.

Claude from Cozy.

support.success: üëè Your message has been sent. Thank you!
support.error: An error occured while sending your message

desktop.title: Get access to your files in your computer
desktop.description: Synchronize all your Cozy Drive files on your computer
desktop.button: Install Cozy Drive on your desktop

mobile.title: Back up and sync your pics from your mobile
mobile.description: All your memories are safe on your Cozy Drive
mobile.button: Install the Cozy Drive app on your mobile

cozy-collect.description: Cozy Collect organize all your files instantly
